bridge.name: Name your NAS HomeKit bridge
bridge.pincode: Attention! it Needs to follow the format -> 123-45-678
bridge.mac: Mac address used by HomeKit to identity the device, needs to be unique XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX

accessoryNasTemperature.label: This is the accessory name that will be show in HomeKit app
accessoryNasTemperature.refreshInterval: refresh interval in seconds for pooling data from nas

accessoryNasConnectedUser.label: This is the accessory name that will be show in HomeKit app
accessoryNasConnectedUser.refreshInterval: refresh interval in seconds for pooling data from nas

accessoryNasUps.label: This is the accessory name that will be show in HomeKit app
accessoryNasUps.refreshInterval: refresh interval in seconds for pooling data from nas

accessoryNasShare.label: This is the accessory name that will be show in HomeKit app
accessoryNasShare.refreshInterval: This is the accessory name that will be show in HomeKit app

nas.username: User with admin rights on the NAS
